alternateName: Lupin III: The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
description: Lupin scrambles to uncover a master thief's eight-billion-dollar treasure. But also on the chase is a band of German soldiers and a retired British agent.
name: Rupan sansei: Harimao no zaiho wo oe!!

original_info.id: Lupin the 3rd: The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure_2002
original_info.name: Lupin the 3rd: The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure

review.name: Lupin with Indiana Jones references equals to a cool anime
review.reviewBody:
This Lupin anime is very cool to watch. Not only is he in Europe but is also hunting down these 3 statues to unlock the ancient "Harimao's Treasure". 

Not only is there Booby traps, puzzles, and a young female archaeologist. There's a band of Nazis trying to get the treasure for themselves. And their leader is very freaky looking.

I won't give out what Harimao's Treasure is, so you gotta see it for yourself. This is another fine Lupin anime to watch. And has plenty of funny parts in it too.

I give it 8/10
